Hello my friends, I'm Toan and just call me Noat.

I'm currently studying in Cantho university in college of Information & Communication Technology in Information Technology major and I will graduate by the time at 2021.

Apart from the school's subjects, I found my passion in Web development in the second year after getting a thought of quitting this major. The reason why I love web development because I'm able to use my power to solve my realistic problems, such as automate my daily boring works.

Moreover, to me, to give is to receive. Hence, on October 2018, I joined CodersX community - a non profit programming organization aims to train and provide IT students in Vietnam enough skills and knowledge to work immediately after graduation.

Contact me and then we will have a coffee together.
